verses.arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَیۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَـٰبِ ٱلۡفِیلِ
verses.translation: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
verses.transliteration: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi ashaabil feel

verses.translation: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
verses.transliteration: Alam yaj'al kai dahum fee tad leel

verses.translation: And He sent against them birds in flocks,
Striking them with stones of hard clay,
verses.transliteration: Tar meehim bi hi jaaratim min sij jeel

verses.translation: And He made them like eaten straw.
